config.helpText: The Layout of this element be changed in a custom twig tempalte.
config.infoText: This element's category data is automatically loaded by the currently selected category. The content just shows a sample preview.
config.rowClassNameLabel: CSS class name of row element
config.colClassNameLabel: CSS class name of col element
config.categoryHelpText: Ordering is equal to the order of adding categories. If no category selected subcategories of the current page will be displayed
